entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
